4318720.name: Battle Sages Demo
4318720.description:
Battle Sages Demo Content

This demo is a limited introduction to Battle Sages and represents an early portion of the full game experience.

In this demo, players will:

  • Play as a new wizard recruit arriving at the military-style bootcamp

  • Select a starting elemental magic type

  • Complete a small set of guided training missions

  • Participate in controlled wizard combat scenarios

  • Learn core movement, shooting, abilities, and basic RPG systems

  • Interact with Drill Instructors and the bootcamp environment

The demo is limited to the bootcamp phase and does not include progression beyond graduation.

The full version of Battle Sages will expand significantly beyond this demo, including:

  • Post-graduation deployment to active duty stations

  • Additional missions, game modes, and combat scenarios

  • Expanded progression systems, abilities, and equipment

  • Multiplayer modes and advanced strategic gameplay

  • Additional environments, enemies, and long-term character development

Progress made in the demo may not carry over to the full game.
